text: The American River is a river in northern California in the United States. It is a tributary of the Sacramento River. The river starts in the Sierra Nevada and flows west through the city of Sacramento. The river is long with a watershed of . Folsom Dam and Folsom Lake are located on the American river east of Sacramento. ==Tributaries== *North Fork American River **Middle Fork American River *South Fork American River Category:Rivers of California Category:El Dorado County, California Category:Placer County, California Category:Sacramento County, California
title: American River
